comment: Most of our senate just officially declared that they do not agree with such a simple, innocent and honest phrase. Too many of our politicians cave in to political correctness and falling in line with the establishment. We need more Hanson's and Anning's in our government.
amr:
# ::snt Most of our senate just officially declared that they do not agree with such a simple, innocent and honest phrase. Too many of our politicians cave in to political correctness and falling in line with the establishment. We need more Hanson's and Anning's in our government.
(m / multi-sentence
      :snt1 (d / declare-01
            :ARG0 (p / person
                  :ARG1-of (ii / include-91
                        :ARG2 (g / government-organization
                              :name (n / name
                                    :op1 "Senate")
                              :poss (w / we))
                        :ARG3 (m2 / most)))
            :ARG1 (a / agree-01
                  :polarity -
                  :ARG0 p
                  :ARG1 (p2 / phrase
                        :ARG1-of (s / simple-02
                              :mod (s2 / such))
                        :ARG1-of (ii2 / innocent-01)
                        :ARG1-of (h / honest-01)))
            :mod (o / official
                  :mod (j / just)))
      :snt2 (a2 / and
            :op1 (c / cave-in-02
                  :ARG0 (p3 / politician
                        :ARG1-of (ii3 / include-91
                              :ARG2 (p4 / politician
                                    :poss w))
                        :ARG1-of (h2 / have-quant-91
                              :ARG2 (m3 / many)
                              :ARG3 (t / too)))
                  :ARG1 (c2 / correctness
                        :mod (p5 / politics)))
            :op2 (f / fall-07
                  :ARG1 p3
                  :ARG2 (ii4 / in-line-04
                        :ARG1 p3
                        :ARG2 (e / establishment))))
      :snt3 (n2 / need-01
            :ARG0 (w2 / we)
            :ARG1 (a3 / and
                  :op1 (p6 / person
                        :name (n3 / name
                              :op1 "Hanson"))
                  :op2 (p7 / person
                        :name (n4 / name
                              :op1 "Anning"))
                  :quant (m4 / more))
            :location (g2 / government-organization
                  :ARG0-of (g3 / govern-01)
                  :poss w2)))

comment: Mentally challenged individuals tend to be highly intelligent so to use that as a way to describe something as stupid is ignorant.
amr:
# ::snt Mentally challenged individuals tend to be highly intelligent so to use that as a way to describe something as stupid is ignorant.
(t / tend-02
      :ARG1 (ii / individual
            :ARG1-of (c / challenge-01
                  :mod (m / mental)))
      :ARG2 (ii2 / intelligent-01
            :ARG1 ii
            :degree (h / high-02))
      :ARG0-of (c2 / cause-01
            :ARG1 (ii3 / ignorant-02
                  :ARG2 (u / use-01
                        :ARG0 ii
                        :ARG1 (t2 / that)
                        :ARG2 (w / way
                              :manner-of (d / describe-01
                                    :ARG0 ii
                                    :ARG1 (s / something)
                                    :ARG2 (s2 / stupid)))))))
